column4: I'm having problems playing music from my DNS-323 (NAS).  I've tried playing both FLAC and MP3 on Amarok, VLC, Totem, and xine, and all four act like they're starting to play, but don't.  skipping to the next track causes each to freeze.  I've rebooted both this laptop and the DNS-323 with no fix.  Same music plays fine on the windows laptop.  Ideas?
does it play when you first copy the music to a local disk?
that could be a codec problem. Install mplayer/ffmpeg/w32codecs and try with mplayer
mplayer also doesn't work.  Tested with an album locally stored that I know has worked before
